## User Story

<!-- https://cucumber.io/docs/gherkin/reference/ -->
```gherkin
Feature: <feature-name>
  As 
  I 
  So 

  Background:
    Given 
    * 
    * 

  Scenario: <scenario-name>
    Given 
    And 
    When 
    Then 
    But 
```
